title: The Giallo Collection: Short night of glass dolls - A.Lado 1971
description:
Short night of glass dolls (La Corta notte delle bambole di vetro) - Aldo Lado 1971  <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0067384/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0067384/</a>

Ingrid Thulin and Mario Adorf co-star in this unusual and startling giallo. The debut of writer/director Aldo Lado. 
Great movie with a wonderful soundtrack by Ennio Morricone

The corpse of reporter Gregory Moore (Jean Sorel) is found in a Prague plaza and brought to the local morgue. But Moore is actually alive, trapped inside his dead body and desperately recalling how the mysterious disappearance of his beautiful girlfriend (Barbara Bach) led to a terrifying conspiracy of depravity. Can a reporter with no visible signs of life solve this perverse puzzle before he meets his ultimate deadline?

Ripped from the Blue Underground release. Encoded with DVD-Shrink. Untouched DVD5.
Wonderful cover to this DVD. If anyone happens to have the original poster (or replica will do in worst case..) I will gladly buy it. 

Audio: English 2.0
Subtitles: None
Picture: 2.35:1 / 16x9
Format: NTSC
Extras:
# Strange Days of the Short Night - Interview with Writer/Director Aldo Lado
# Theatrical Trailer
# Aldo Lado Filmography 

Enjoy!
